channel.title: Wierd thing is happening
channel.description: Well I followed the tutorial on making a server and I have everything running right. I can log onto the server, code, etc. But when I try to make other people log on they can't. What did I do wrong?

item.title: Wierd thing is happening
item.dc:creator: @Pk2pk_Owner Pk2pk Owner
item.description:
@Pk2pk_Owner wrote:

Go to www.No-ip.com, sign into the account you created during the tutorial of how to make a server. On the left sidebar look for a subtitle saying “Hosts/Redirects” Look just under there and you will see a link saying “Manage”, Click on that. Now, look near the right side of the page. You will see something like “Modify|Delete”, Click on Modify.

Hostname: pk2pk.no-ip.org
Host Type:
DNS Host (A) (o) <— CHECK THIS CIRCLE!!
DNS Host (Round Robin) ( )
DNS Alias (CNAME) ( )
Port 80 Redirect ( )
Web Redirect
IP Address: <— LOOK IN THE TOP RIGHT HAND CORNER OF THE PAGE, COPY THAT IP AND PASTE IT HERE.^
Assign to Group: - - - View Groups | Add Group
Allow Wildcards: Enhanced/Plus Feature

Advanced Record:
Manage

Last Update:
2008-08-19 00:05:47

Scroll down the page a little bit, click “Modify Host”, And your done, People can Join!

P.S, If you want more people to join, post your server on Moparscape Server Status page

Read full topic

item.title: Wierd thing is happening
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

You probably Prot Forwarded wrong, or your No-Ip may be configured incorrectly.

Read full topic
